MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL74 postcode area of Tyn-Y-Gongl affecting properties in Benllech and surrounding area.Due to the complexities of the repairs to the mains underground cable, our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm via generator. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.40am on March 6, 2021.
